籤詩版本二:
Lin Wei ndi nyalugwe amene amalondera pakhomo, ayenera kukhala wamphamvu osati kuvulaza ena.
Zimanenedwa momveka bwino kuti palibe chitetezo.Nkhawa, kukayikira, mantha ndi mantha zili m'nkhalango → nkhuni.
詩意:
Mu hexagram iyi, mitengo ya m'nkhalango ndi akambuku ali ndi chithunzi champhamvu.
Zowopsa zonse zabodza sizikhala zenizeni.
解曰: Chitofucho chimayatsa matalala. Zili ngati mphepo yagwera m'makutu ogontha. Likhoza kukhala dalitso. Zinthu zabwino zimadza pambuyo pake ndipo zoyipa zimachitika patsogolo pawo.
籤詩故事一:
◇Pang Hong akuwopa Bao Gong
Renzong of the Song Dynasty. Bao Gong ndi bwanamkubwa wa Kaifeng Prefecture (dzina lovomerezeka, lofanana ndi prefect). Pang Hong anali apongozi (mlamu wa mfumu) ndipo anatsekera General Di Qing. Pamene Bao Gong adapempha kuti mlanduwu ubwere, Pang Hong anachita mantha ndipo adauletsa m'njira zambiri. Pambuyo pake, mlanduwu unadziwika ndipo bodza la Pang Hong linatsimikiziridwa. Anaperekedwa ku lamulo lachifumu la Emperor Renzong wa Song Dynasty ndipo anamasulidwa chifukwa cha achibale ake.
聖意: Kusakhazikika panyumba, kudzilankhula, kufunsa ndalama, anthu oyipa, bizinesi yoyipa, kusagwirizana m'banja, Liujia, inshuwaransi yabodza, oyenda pansi otsekereza minda, kuwonongeka kwa mbozi za silika, kuwononga ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi, anthu osowa, milandu yapagulu, kutayika, kusamuka, kusakonda, kutayika. katundu, matenda, nsembe, Husani manda, zoipa
第X籤: Makumi asanu ndi atatu mphambu asanu ndi atatu Kupambana Loti
